  • Method Details

    • loadCrew

      public void loadCrew(Player player, Coordinates pinkAlienCoords, Coordinates brownAlienCoords) throws InvalidStateException
      Handles the process of loading the crew onto a player's ship. Allows the player to assign pink and/or brown aliens to specific ship coordinates.
      Overrides:
      loadCrew in class GameState
      Parameters:
      player - The player attempting to load the crew.
      pinkAlienCoords - The coordinates where the pink alien is to be loaded, or null if no pink alien is being assigned.
      brownAlienCoords - The coordinates where the brown alien is to be loaded, or null if no brown alien is being assigned.
      Throws:
      InvalidStateException - If the action is performed by a player out of turn.

    • updateView

      public void updateView(View view, Game toDisplay) throws IOException
      Updates the given view with the current state of the provided game object.
      Overrides:
      updateView in class GameState
      Parameters:
      view - the view instance that should be updated
      toDisplay - the game object containing the state to render on the view
      Throws:
      IOException - if an input or output exception occurs during the view update
